meanings.definition: To undo the rip or opening of something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully unripped the seam of her dress to fix it.
meanings.sent2: He unripped the package to see what was inside.
meanings.sent3: The magician unripped the fabric to reveal a hidden pocket.
meanings.sent4: The detective unripped the mystery to uncover the truth.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, she unripped the envelope to reveal the surprise inside.

meanings.sent1: The unrip fruit was too sour to eat.
meanings.sent2: The unrip banana was still green.
meanings.sent3: The unrip puppy was full of energy and mischief.
meanings.sent4: Her unrip talent needed time to develop and mature.
meanings.sent5: The unrip apple lacked the sweetness of a fully ripe one.
